records.note_contesto: Ten irregular migrants were apprehended by Greek Police. They alleged robbery, violent deportation from Bulgaria to Greece by Bulgarian police authorities, and being forced to leave their clothes, shoes, and telephones in Bulgaria. FRO considers that the alleged facts could amount to serious breaches of the right to life, integrity, asylum, human dignity, the prohibition of torture and inhuman and degrading treatment, and of collective expulsion.
records.evidenza_testuale: FRO considers that the alleged facts could amount to serious breaches of the right to life, integrity, asylum, human dignity, the prohibition of torture and inhuman and degrading treatment, and of collective expulsion.
